events.name: Familie Redlich
events.description: During my studies at the BHT, I participated in an internship. In the agency Familie Redlich I learned to create websites and was able to work on my own website until the end. This website contained a memory game for children. The whole thing took place in the context of the S-Bahn Kids campaign.

events.name: Akademie der Wissenschaften
events.description: At the Academy of Sciences I was able to further deepen my knowledge in website design and development. I even participated in a project, which was nominated for and won the DARIAH DE DH Award 2018.

events.name: Revvis Ltd.
events.description:
During my time at Revvis Ltd., I was initially hired as a Unity developer. However, it quickly became apparent to my colleagues that my contributions to the UI were noteworthy, and as a result, I was reassigned to the role of the sole UI/UX designer relatively early on.

As the UI/UX designer, I took on the responsibility of designing the entire interface for the Revvis application. This involved creating a theme and design system that would ensure a consistent and user-friendly experience for our users. My tasks primarily consisted of designing multiple interfaces and creating a catalog system. I took great care to ensure that the interfaces were both aesthetically pleasing and functional, while the catalog system was easy to navigate and visually appealing.

Overall, my time at Revvis Ltd. allowed me to showcase my design skills and grow as a UI/UX designer. It was a challenging and rewarding experience, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to have contributed to the success of the project.

events.name: iXtenda GmbH
events.description: I was working as a technical artist in a small team of 6 people. We were developing multiple applications in C#. My main role was creating an UI design.

events.name: Finmas GmbH
events.description: At Finmas GmbH I was working as a UI/UX designer on multiple procets correlating to the Finanz Informatik, the IT service provider of the Sparkassen-Finanzgruppe. I was responsible for maintaining our own design system and creating new designs for our applications. Also I supported the development team with the implementation of the designs.

events.name: Lessing Gymnasium
events.description: I graduated from the Lessing Gymnasium in Berlin. I got my best grades in computer class and art.

events.name: Berliner Hochschule f√ºr Technik (BHT)
events.description: I started my media informatics studies at the Berlin University of Applied Sciences (BHT). There I learned the basics of Java, Git, app development (Android and iOS), software development, databases, UI/UX design and Unity.

events.name: University of Applied Sciences
events.description: I was studying computer science at the University of Applied Sciences in Berlin. I was learning about the basics of computer science, algorithms, data structures, databases, operating systems, networks, software engineering, and many more.
